Relawan Di Kab. OKI mendeklarasikan Pemenangan Jokowi – Ma’aruf Amin 2 Periode

Terima kasih Tuhan, “Benar apa yg selama ini ditwitter Aku selalu mengetik “#2019 Mohon Pak JOKOWI 1X Lagi & Faktanya Hasil Undian No Urut di KPU Tuhan mendengar Do’a Aku & mempercayakan Pak JOKOWI  Pak KH Ma’aruf Amin dgn NO Urut 1” karena yang diperebutkan RI 1 MERDEKA.

The best argument so far that comes from the golput (not the opposition) faction is that they are against choosing the lesser evil as in that’s what Ma’aruf Amin represented for them, and I understand where they came from, but I agree so much with this.

“Saya sudah di telepon semua Bupati dan DPRD dari Partai Demokrat bahwa mereka dukung dan siap “ikat suara” bagi Jokowi – Ma’aruf Amin dalam Pemilihan Presiden RI periode kedua 2019 – 2024,” kata Lukas Enembe (Demokrat Papua) #2019PilihJokowiMarufAmin http://papuasatu.com/headline/demi-jokowi-lukas-enembe-saya-siap-dipecat-dari-demokrat/ …

I’d probably gonna end up voting for Jokowi anyway for the sake of the realm but I cannot bear to think that, if one day LGBT Indonesians are more and more persecuted, I’ll be somehow responsible by putting Ma’aruf Amin into power.

Smart move for our beloved President, Mr. @jokowi that has been choosing KH. Ma'aruf Amin as the next Vice President in 2019. Even tho that there are a lot of candidate who brings a hope for make better of Indonesia also. Salute! #2019TetapJokowi
